Line 107: Line 107:
== [[Japan]] ==
== [[Japan]] ==
===    2 Killed ===
===    2 Killed ===
â
[[File:Beheading japanese.jpg|thumb|right|[[Shosei Koda]], before his beheading]]
 
:* '''[[Shosei Koda]]''', a tourist, was confirmed beheaded on October 30, 2004. He had been kidnapped on October 26, 2004.
:* '''[[Shosei Koda]]''', a tourist, was confirmed beheaded on October 30, 2004. He had been kidnapped on October 26, 2004.
:* '''[[Akihiko Saito]]''', a security contractor, was kidnapped after a convoy attack and reported killed on May 28, 2005.
:* '''[[Akihiko Saito]]''', a security contractor, was kidnapped after a convoy attack and reported killed on May 28, 2005.
Line 162: Line 161:
===    11 Killed ===
===    11 Killed ===
:* '''[[Nicholas Evan Berg]]''', a businessman went missing on April 9, 2004. His widely-publicized beheading was shown in a video May 11, 2004. His body had been found the day before. [[Abu Musab al-Zarqawi]] is believed to have personally beheaded Berg.
:* '''[[Nicholas Evan Berg]]''', a businessman went missing on April 9, 2004. His widely-publicized beheading was shown in a video May 11, 2004. His body had been found the day before. [[Abu Musab al-Zarqawi]] is believed to have personally beheaded Berg.
â
[[Image:JackHensley.PNG|thumb|right|[[Jack Hensley]], prior to his beheading]]
 
:* '''[[Olin Eugene Armstrong]]''', a contractor for the [[construction]] firm ''Gulf Supplies Commercial Services'' of the [[United Arab Emirates]]<ref name="employer">{{Cite web|url=http://edition.cnn.com/2004/WORLD/meast/09/20/iraq.beheading/|title=Video shows American hostage beheaded|accessdate=2008-03-30|publisher=CNN|date=2004-09-20}}</ref>, was kidnapped on September 16, 2004. He was [[decapitation|beheaded]]<ref name=factbox>[http://www.reuters.com/article/topNews/idUSL297059220070531 FACTBOX-Prominent kidnappings of foreigners in Iraq] Accessed 12 March 2008.</ref> on 20 September 2004.<ref name="captors">{{Cite web|url=http://www.cbc.ca/world/story/2004/09/20/hostage040920.html|title=American hostage beheaded: video|accessdate=2008-03-30|publisher=CBC|date=2004-09-20}}</ref> [[Abu Musab al-Zarqawi]] is believed to have personally beheaded Armstrong.<ref>http://www.outsidethebeltway.com/archives/2004/09/web_site_american_hostage_killed_in_iraq/</ref> The following day, the group [[decapitation|beheaded]] fellow American '''[[Jack Hensley]]''', and threatened to kill their third hostage, Briton '''[[Kenneth Bigley]]''', unless the [[United States of America|United States]] met their demands to free all women prisoners in Iraqi jails.<ref name="employer"/> Bigley was beheaded in October 2004.<ref name=factbox/>:
:* '''[[Olin Eugene Armstrong]]''', a contractor for the [[construction]] firm ''Gulf Supplies Commercial Services'' of the [[United Arab Emirates]]<ref name="employer">{{Cite web|url=http://edition.cnn.com/2004/WORLD/meast/09/20/iraq.beheading/|title=Video shows American hostage beheaded|accessdate=2008-03-30|publisher=CNN|date=2004-09-20}}</ref>, was kidnapped on September 16, 2004. He was [[decapitation|beheaded]]<ref name=factbox>[http://www.reuters.com/article/topNews/idUSL297059220070531 FACTBOX-Prominent kidnappings of foreigners in Iraq] Accessed 12 March 2008.</ref> on 20 September 2004.<ref name="captors">{{Cite web|url=http://www.cbc.ca/world/story/2004/09/20/hostage040920.html|title=American hostage beheaded: video|accessdate=2008-03-30|publisher=CBC|date=2004-09-20}}</ref> [[Abu Musab al-Zarqawi]] is believed to have personally beheaded Armstrong.<ref>http://www.outsidethebeltway.com/archives/2004/09/web_site_american_hostage_killed_in_iraq/</ref> The following day, the group [[decapitation|beheaded]] fellow American '''[[Jack Hensley]]''', and threatened to kill their third hostage, Briton '''[[Kenneth Bigley]]''', unless the [[United States of America|United States]] met their demands to free all women prisoners in Iraqi jails.<ref name="employer"/> Bigley was beheaded in October 2004.<ref name=factbox/>:
:* '''[[Jack Hensley]]''', a contractor, was kidnapped with '''[[Olin Eugene Armstrong]]''' and '''[[Kenneth Bigley]]'''. He was beheaded September 21, 2004.
:* '''[[Jack Hensley]]''', a contractor, was kidnapped with '''[[Olin Eugene Armstrong]]''' and '''[[Kenneth Bigley]]'''. He was beheaded September 21, 2004.
